title: Structures, Not Strings: Linguistics as Part of the Cognitive Sciences

tldr.text: Here it is shown how recent developments in generative grammar, taking language as a computational cognitive mechanism seriously, allow us to address issues left unexplained in the increasingly popular surface-oriented approaches to language.
